timeline.bodyText: mmm why Optional? There must always be a post state for a case, from a business point of view is not optional. So modelling this in the API as Optional it feels to me a bit confusing. I'd just define this as String, also considering that we already have import validation that mandates specifying a default case right?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText: I'd change this to String, and throw exception if we can't resolve a state since this is really something that should never happen and be prevented via config. It's not something we can recover from
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText: I would add a method isDefault() to EventPostStateDefinition which itself checks whether enablingCondition == null. This way the rule about when a condition is a default condition is encapsulated in one place rather than scattered around and potentially duplicated all over the places.
timeline.author: mario-paniccia
